## Template Description

This template defines the primary details of a discipline incident. One record should be submitted per each reportable School Safety incident. See the Discipline Domain description for more information on reportable incidents. If a school has no reportable School Safety incidents for the entire school year a record indicating this must be entered in the Location Fact Template, refer to that section.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit Administrative Unit Number (AUN) assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `SUBMITTING DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

---
### 3 - INCIDENT ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={30} /></p>

An identifier assigned by the LEA to the incident; this identifier must be unique within each LEA per school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`9801`
</details>

---
### 4 - INCIDENT DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

The date the incident took place.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2023-10-05`
</details>

---
### 5 - SCHOOL NUMBER OF INCIDENT
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

The PDE defined 4-digit code identifying the school where the incident took place.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`1234`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `LOCATION CODE OF INCIDENT`

---
### 6 - LOCAL INCIDENT ID
<p><Badge color="optional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={30} /></p>

The local identifier used by the LEA to track the incident, if different than [Field 3 (INCIDENT ID)](#3---incident-id).

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`1523`
</details>

---
### 7 - INCIDENT PLACE CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

The place of occurrence of the incident.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix Y](docs/appendix/appendix-Y.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 8 - INCIDENT TIME FRAME CODE
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

The time the incident occurred.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if [Field 7 (INCIDENT PLACE CODE)](#7---incident-place-code) = `1` - On school property/grounds.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `1` – before school hours
- `2` – during school hours
- `3` – after school hours
</details>

---
### 9 - INCIDENT AGAINST PROPERTY INDICATOR
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

Indicator that specifies whether the incident was against property.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `Y`
- `N`
</details>

---
### 10-23
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 24 - UNFOUNDED INDICATOR
<p><Badge color="optional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

Indicator that identifies a reported incident determined to be unfounded.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `Y`
- `N`
</details>

---
### 25 - LLE INCIDENT NUMBER
<p><Badge color="optional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={20} /></p>

The incident number used by the local law enforcement agency to identify the incident.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`A1-1234568`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `LLE INCIDENT ID`

---
## Rules

See the Rules Section of the Template Domain
